page.title: 03RELIGION _THE CHURCH
page.content: The two churches in this area are Northleach and Hampnet. There is only one active clergyman, the Rev. Brown, plus a few now retired. Church activities include a Sunday School, choir, Mothers Union and house meetings, the latter being attended by 8_30 people. Northleach church has two main services, 9.30 matins and 6.30 evensong with others during the week. The Rev. Brown's ministry includes visiting local schools and responsibility as chaplain of the hospital and visiting homes. Tourists are important for the church's accounts and upkeep about 12,000 _ 15,000 visiting every year. The Rev. Brown thinks that Northleach has a duty to the community whilst having its own special meaning. In the future the church hopes to bring together the community and to share the faith.
